name: Pulveryze
description:
My second game - a variation on Space Invaders made with C64 palette and NES music tracker.

There are weird 50s Sci-Fi UFOs, cartoony aliens, laser beams, lots of crunchy pixels and an 8-bit heavy metal track that loops over and over again. What's not to like?

There is a flash version and a downloadable windows version. 

The web version controls are standard: arrow keys and your choice of Z, X, C or Space as the fire button.

With the downloadable version you should be able to play with any gamepad you might have. I tested it with an xbox 360 controller (both the left stick and d-pad work) and several random no-name retro controllers. Also in this version - Esc exits the game.
